definition: mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: Chinese and English punctuation have many differences.
sentences.chinese: 中文標點和英文的有很多不同。

sentences.english: Punctuation marks are an integrant sign of cohesion and coherence in modern writing.
sentences.chinese: 標點符號是現代書面語中不可缺少的銜接和連貫標誌。

sentences.english: Be consistent in grammar or punctuation.
sentences.chinese: 在文筆和標點符號上保持一致。

sentences.english: And then we predict which target he wants to go to.
sentences.chinese: 然後我們預測他想到達哪個目標點。

sentences.english: And I sigh with my punctuations.
Punctuation is a little strange with Swype.
sentences.chinese: 在Swype上，打標點有些小奇怪。

sentences.english: Our teacher is very fussy about punctuation.
sentences.chinese: 我們老師對標點符號十分挑剔。

sentences.english: Do not append or prepend a digit or punctuation mark to a word.
sentences.chinese: 不要附加或預先準備一個數字或標點符號的一個字。

sentences.english: As English is characterized by hypotaxis, its syntax is closely bound up with punctuation as well as other typographical devices.
sentences.chinese: 英語屬於形合語言，標點符號與句法結構關係密切。

sentences.english: I always forget to add the punctuation at the end of a sentence.
sentences.chinese: 我總是忘記在句末加上標點符號。

sentences.english: The third day is spent looking for back-ups.
sentences.chinese: “第三天我則用來找一些備用的標點”。

sentences.english: The pupils have not yet learned to punctuate correctly.
sentences.chinese: 小學生尚未學會正確使用標點符號。

sentences.english: Punctuation symbols must be recognized and properly interpreted.
sentences.chinese: 必須正確認識和理解標點符號。

sentences.english: Comma is a kind of punctuation.
And a cursor around the target tells us he did it correctly.
sentences.chinese: 通過光標和目標點我們能夠確定猴子做對了。

sentences.english: As for its punctuations, the confusion could be easily seen.

definition: to pause at appropriate points in reading aloud unpunctuated writing/to punctuate
clauses and sub-clauses (in formal document)/entry (in a dictionary, encyclopedia etc)
marginal notes/annotation/to annotate/to add comments to text
pausing at the end of a phrase or sentence (in former times, before punctuation marks were used)/punctuation/periods and commas/sentences and phrases
reference book (such as dictionary, almanac, gazetteer etc)
to annotate/to add marginal comments on/criticism/marginalia
simplified form of Chinese characters, as opposed to traditional form 繁體|繁体[fan2 ti3]
